website_summaries.verdict: A history lesson in the sand allowing kids to learn about their favorite dinosaurs.
pros: These miniature dinosaur figures make for a challenging game to find in the sand
Allows adults and kids to get creative and create real-life excavation experiences
Provides hands-on and highly interactive play
cons: The figures may be smaller in size than anticipated

customer_reviews.title: Names for some of the dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: They're not entirely anatomically correct, but great for the money. My shipment had 12 distinct species, but I've given 2 away already. When my granddaughter dug one up, she declared it a dinosaur when only a spec was visible. Great fun! Here are names for 10 of the dinosaurs. For one of the dinosaurs, we weren't sure _which_ theropod. If any paleozoologists are reading this, feel free to leave a comment with corrections.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Updated: I ordered another set in hopes that I would get the dinosaurs I missed before. This time it was even WORSE. I got 6 different dinosaurs 2 or 3 of each of the different designs. Ridiculous. Disappointed. The picture shows Tyrannosaurus and stegosaurus and brontosaurus. We got 2 triceratops and 2 pentaceratops. We are building bodies for them with more magic and of course all kids want a T. rex over 2 pentaceratops. Would probably purchase elsewhere for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: ShiJess

customer_reviews.title: stand to attention
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yo grandson has hundreds of toy dinosaurs. Fossils of his favorite friends was a great hit when he opened the box! He was so excited and jumped right in to playing with them. The skeletal details and depiction of the dino's is great! Close to true to life. Great for the infamous dino battles. I took away one star because only 1/2 of the 12 dinos stand on their own. The other 6 fall and cannot stand upright. This feature defeats the purpose of display and imaginative battles.
customer_reviews.author: shirley moretti

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: I was super surprised by the detail in these. They're very intricate. Great deal for the money. The only way they could be better is if they could be taken apart and put back together (they can't). I'm very pleased with these, we put them in a plastic shoebox full of play sand for my preschooler's dinosaur theme week at home. We use a paintbrush to dust off the sand like real archaeologists. Pinterest has a ton of cute stuff I did for her lesson plan and I picked up several books at the library. She is enthralled. Came back to Amazon to purchase some fish figurines for the Ocean themed week. Recommend these "bones" 100%!
customer_reviews.author: Justthe2ofus

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy for Creative Play!
customer_reviews.text: We used these dinosaurs to create playdoh dinosaur fossils by pressing them into....you guess it, playdoh! Such a fun and easy project for kids! And, as a bonus for moms, it will engage the kiddos for a nice large chunk of time! ;) My girls are 3 and 5 and they really enjoyed these. This craft is also a great opportunity to teach children about different types of fossils. Up next, we'll be using them in a dino dig in the sandbox at the park!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toys!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a dino fanatic. Tons of toys, etc. I ordered these because he had wanted a dinosaur cake for his birthday. We wound up doing cupcakes instead so did not use these, but that's ok because they went into his toy bin and he loves playing with them. They look realistic, good quality, not super flimsy, stand up well. The dinos are all different and my kids thought that was really neat. Very happy with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great for classroom dig!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice and very sturdy. I got them to go with my 2nd-grade paleontology and fossil unit. EL Expeditionary Learning Module. They don't seem like they'd break easily. I got them so that I can cast them in plaster so my students can have their own real fossil dig. They'll love them. I also go the larger size of the same ones for indoor recess time. Same great quality for both sizes. Our school bought a set of the small and big for all our 2nd-grade classrooms after seeing mine.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, but one big issue...
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price. They are smaller than advertised, but there are 12 distinct dinosaurs rather than repeats. I buried them in the sandbox while my kid is at school, and he just spent two hours digging up the "fossils." He loves them. One thing that you should know is that 2-3 of them cannot stand up on their own due to how they were made. That's disappointing. Pretend play isn't as fun if the only thing they can so is play dead.
customer_reviews.author: No Disrespect

customer_reviews.title: 68 year old kid loves these figures!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several of these for kids, and I finally decided to get one for myself. These are nice to look at where I placed them for display...and they are educational as well. At 68 years of age I am rapidly becoming a dinosaur myself, and even though I may be headed for my own extinction, this set brings out the kid in me...so it's almost like having my own time machine where I can pop back to the days of my inquisitive youth and look at wonder at what these figures represent to our Earth's history and my still childlike wonder of such things. These are wonderful collectors' items. No home should be without one!!!
customer_reviews.author: theonlyjeff

customer_reviews.title: Great quality...just not 6-7" in length as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a "dino bones" 5th birthday party. Recieved 12 different species. All has the aged look which I prefer because c'mon they're "dino bones". Most of them are 5-6" in length...not a deal breaker but the advertisement should be changed. And, most of the two legged walkers don't stand either...which isn't a deal breaker for me but my son on the other hand was a little upset. However, overall they're great quality and will turn into digging toys after the party. Would purchased again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: USN20yrs

customer_reviews.title: I love these dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: We loved these dinosaurs. I purchased them for my son’s dinosaur birthday party over a year ago and they’re still going strong. They’ve mostly been used outside in the sand box. They’ve been out through rain, snow, storms, wind, etc. and they’re still in great condition. Originally, we used these for a “dino dig” for his party. We buried them in the sand that let the kids dig for them. It was way more exciting to them to find dinosaur skeletons than colorful dinosaurs. It was also fun to watch them try to identify the dinosaur skeletons. These dinosaurs are a great value. They’ve been worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: ... bought these for my 3yr old grandson and he loved them. They are not as light as the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 3yr old grandson and he loved them. They are not as light as the photo shows, however other customer pictures show a more accurate color that is darker in color. A few of the fossils didn't stand at all and the plastic is not flexible as stated in the description. It's not enough of a problem to return them so we'll probably do some kind of project with the ones that don't stand up. Nice sizes that vary depending on what dinosaur type but they match heights pretty well with the toy dinosaurs he has already. Overall good purchase and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BlueSky101

customer_reviews.title: Great for a dinosaur-themed party!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a fossil dig activity at my son's birthday party and they were an incredible hit! While it's true that the selection varies per package, that didn't really matter to us as the kids were having a ton of fun digging through the sand to find them. I was impressed by their quality and sturdiness; these toys were buried, jostled about, tossed about, and generally roughed around and not one broke. The toys were well-received by the children's parents, as well!
customer_reviews.author: ana101

customer_reviews.title: Most of them okay
customer_reviews.text: I recieved the correct quantity and size (6") figures in a darker color than the picture that gave them an aged look that I liked better. Most of the figures were okay and decent quality for the price. The 5 figures in the attached image arrived with their limbs too twisted to be able to stand. If all of them had arrived without this defect I would have given 5 stars based on the quantity, quality, and price.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Description is untrue, much smaller and cheaper looking
customer_reviews.text: Not at all as described. No where near 6-7". Max size is about 3"-4" and I'm being generous. They will make my kids happy but I do not recommend based on the description. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: s.meeks

customer_reviews.title: Half the size as advertised, double the price, no returns
customer_reviews.text: While this item is described as 6-7” skeleton dinosaurs (toy), the items that arrived are the same size as the 3.5-4” version, but cost twice the price. They are ineligible for return although they were shipped from my local amazon warehouse and purchased through Prime. Quality, despite size error, is typical for a $1 plastic, made in china toy.
customer_reviews.author: mamasseur

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to a Dino Dig party
customer_reviews.text: I bought these dinosaurs for a birthday party and used them as table decor. I was pleased with the size of them and everyone thought they were cool. The price was very reasonable and there was a good variety of dinosaur types. One type in particular was difficult to keep standing without leaning it against something and they smelled a bit like tobacco when first out of the bag. My daughter even noticed the smell while we were decorating, but it didn't seem to bother anyone at the party.
customer_reviews.author: Alwaysrushin

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving discription
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware: First order: I love the quality of these, but I can only give 3 stars because we were shorted 4 dinosaurs. :( Package says 12, we got 8. Second order: Cheap junk from China not worth your time or money. I really wish Amazon had better quality control because I wanted more of the original product advertised, not cheap knockoff junk. (See photo for differences, 1st order on the left)
customer_reviews.author: Lucky in Love

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a recent camp and loved the versatility. I used them along with large dinosaur figurines and had the kids match the skeletons to the figurines and we talked about the bones, joints, how the dinosaurs were different/same, looked at the T-Rex's short arms, the long wing structure of the Pteradon, etc. We compared what we could see on the skeleton that was apparent on the "skin" dinosaur and what was different. At the end of the week, I buried a skeleton in plaster of paris for each child to dig out. We talked about how paleontologists/archeologists/anthropologists take great care in digging, using small chisels and brushes, etc. The kids really enjoyed the cool-factor of the skeletons.
customer_reviews.author: Shannyn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome "bury, dig up, repeat" toy
customer_reviews.text: My kids love to use these dino bones. We took them to the beach this summer and they buried them repeatedly in the sand, all day every day. They used them as part of their sand sculptures. They played hide-and-seek with each other with the dino bones. We brought them home and they use them in the backyard to bury and uncover; they like to pretend they are paleontologists. The one semi-complaint I have is that these are such a "bone" color that they are often hard to find and we've lost a few in the sand and dirt, in weeds and bushes, in rocks. But they definitely provide a ton of entertainment!
customer_reviews.author: K W

customer_reviews.title: Was a best buy. I wanted to get the dinosaurs that ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a best buy. I wanted to get the dinosaurs that your kids could chip away kits but these were way cheaper and a nice size. I bought several put them in the plastic throw away containers that are like the size of a cake pan and then poured plaster of paris over them and let that set. The result was an over an hour of daycare engagement chipping these things out for a fraction of the cost of buying the ready made kits. Awesome. I also just hid them in the sand for younger children.
customer_reviews.author: jill sabayrac smith

customer_reviews.title: The ones I got were great
customer_reviews.text: The dinosaurs that arrived look as I expected them (the color I expected with 'dirt' accents as though they had been dug up) and they are the correct size as described. Extremely disappointed to only have received 8 unique species (4 sets of 2 and 4 additional unique) when the description specifically says the box includes 12. I don't need them to stand up as we'll be burying them to 'dig' up with a little one, but if you needed them to it's about 50/50 whether they will or not, even within the duplicates!
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Fabulous Price
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fabulous Price. My son and his funs loved these. I bought them for a birthday part and used them as decorations and then as party favors. They are made of a durable plastic and are well constructed. My son tells my they are pretty accurate too. I would definitely buy these again...but may add an extra batch so the kids don't fight over specific dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.author: A. McCown

customer_reviews.title: Love them, may purchase more.
customer_reviews.text: These are really really cute. You get so many of them for the price too? They seem to be heed quality and we have not had any break with pretty heavy use. I ordered them to bury in the sand box for my kids to dig up. They like to just play with them as is though or they play with them in their kinetic sand. I might purchase some more to give my nephew as a gift with a box of kinetic sand .
customer_reviews.author: MamaKat

customer_reviews.title: Tiny NOT What was described
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my sons birthday and was extremely disappointed. They were described as 6-7" and the largest is 3". I am returning them. I have a very unhappy little boy.
customer_reviews.author: familyfun

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: You cant beat the price on this set. The quality is great. I plan on using them for a Dino Dig Sensory bin. But it looks like they will last much longer. It will be a nice collection of dinoasaurs for my son to have.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis P

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: Figures are a nice size and detail for our grandson. We actually bought several bags of these for grandsons ages 4, 5 and 7 - they all love them. Probably hard to find a dinosaur boys this age don't go crazy over but they are all happy.
customer_reviews.author: McElligot's Pool

customer_reviews.title: They're made of a really tough plastic that seems super durable. Plus dinosaur skeletons are just cool in ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally got these as as party favors for my son's first birthday but ended up keeping all of them for him. They're made of a really tough plastic that seems super durable. Plus dinosaur skeletons are just cool in general, who doesn't like that? Absolutely worth the already cheap price because its a high quality product. The kid is going to be two in a few months and has been playing with them... Well, about as well as a kid his age can play with them, but he also seems to enjoy them a lot as well. Great purchase though, great product.
customer_reviews.author: ginkit

customer_reviews.title: Dino Fossil Skeletons - Hit if the party!
customer_reviews.text: These little dino's were the HIT of the Party! I buried them in the sand box that my son received for this 3rd birthday. The kids had so much fun digging them up. The ones they found they got to keep and take home as party favors. We still have a few in the sand box that my son buries and digs up several times a week. So much fun andI received so many compliments on what a great idea it was and how much fun the kids had with this adventure. I'd recommend these to all dino lovers! :) Thank you for the quick shipment as well. :)
customer_reviews.author: Misty Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase.  Realistic looking Mini's
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a few of these at the Cabazon California Dinosaur gift shop. They were fun and cute. When I got back home I offered a few as souvenirs and everyone took them. I'm planning another trip to California this summer and thought I would stop again and get more until I saw them here. Whole bag for what I paid for just 5 or 6. Size varies from about 6-7 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Peterdragon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome skeletons
customer_reviews.text: I used these at a Dino birthday party as table decorations- the kids loved them. We had a blast burying in some sand later. They are very cool. We have only broken one so I believe them to be pretty sturdy. Ours have been through a lot and most are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: These are not the 6-7" dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: These are neat little dinosaurs but they are NOT 6-7" long they are more like 3-4". I was disappointed in size especially since I thought I was getting the bigger ones that's the reason for the 3 rating. The package says 6-7" on it but they are not the right size.
customer_reviews.author: gamergirl 50

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sandbox toys
customer_reviews.text: Buried them in the sand for my 3-year-old grandson to find. Even after 6 months, he's still delighted to uncover them. (Note: The name of each is printed on the bottom so you can learn them along with the child.)
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Killingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Unique and the kids love them
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little set. My 3 year old is a dinosaur fanatic, and these get played with daily. They are really unique and we haven't found anything like them in the stores. The size of the dinosaurs are between 3"-4" and we don't worry about having them out with our one year old. They are very durable and I don't see them breaking. They aren't posable, but my son doesn't mind. You get a lot of bang for your buck with this nice unique set.
customer_reviews.author: Stumped? just ask Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great for a fossil dig!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a fossil dig for the kids. These are the perfect size! They're big enough for little hands to find but not so big that you have to make the fossil dig site too large. We had a lot of fun and she still plays with them even now.
customer_reviews.author: C. Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Nephew goes nuts with bag of dinosaur skeletons
customer_reviews.text: My nephew is five and already he says he wants to be a paleontologist. It's not just a word for him. He understands "extinction", can describe what paleontologists do with precision and great detail with relevant vocabulary plus is non-stop with questions - - all of which is distressing to his grandparents who keep asking him about being an engineer (like Grandpa) or a lawyer (like his dad). I get blamed. As to this bag of skeletons, they are durable and can take punishment when small hands play with them. Unfortunately, but understandably, they do not differ proportionally in sizes. After observations in museums, he is already aware of size differentials.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Putman

customer_reviews.title: nice selection and quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son's dino themed bday party and ended up using them to make dino fossil cookies. I baked sugar cookies, and as they were cooling, I pressed the cookies with the parts of the dinos to make fossil impressions. The pterodactyl worked the best. Kids and adults loved them and they looked great on the table.
customer_reviews.author: JMGJAX

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for a 5-year-old grandson
customer_reviews.text: The perfect gift for a 5-year-old grandson. He likes to build his own dinosaurs using modeling clay applied over the skeletons so they become an armature of sorts. He creates hundreds of different colored dinosaurs with this set of skeletons.
customer_reviews.author: Curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent size!
customer_reviews.text: These are large and nicer dinosaurs! I bought them for a birthday dig. I knew they were bigger but I was surprised at just how large they were once they arrived. We played with them some and I’m very satisfied. I can’t wait to do the birthday dig!
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Were very dirty and looked old or used? I didnt want my child to play w/them after seeing what they looked like in person
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly high quality!
customer_reviews.text: Quite pleased with these. Was prepared to get small, non standing, repeating figures. All are unique, self standing, and quite big, actually. The repeating ones that other people are talking about I do see how you could think you got. Included are a few different species of the same group. Two triceratops LIKE species, etc. Without looking closely and knowing something about dinos, it would be easy to think you got doubles. I recommend you get these guys. :) They look quite nice sitting around my office.
customer_reviews.author: Not me, someone else

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: So cute. Some don't stand, but I ordered three packs so I just threw away the ones that don't stand. The ones that do stand are so cool! My son loves them and I'm sure his friends will too. We are giving these for his birthday goodie bags with playdoh so they can make fossils. They are very detailed and a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Favata

customer_reviews.title: Not the sizes described or pictured.
customer_reviews.text: This is not what is pictured, nor is the correct sizes. The items sent are much smaller than 4". This is from May 2018 and they are not adjusting the product information nor updating pictures. Do not buy if after larger figures.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just wish there were more kinds instead of duplicates in this order.
customer_reviews.text: very realistic and accurate to what the dinosaurs skeletons most likely look like. my three year old loves them so much and he can tell you which dinosaur they are, even without their skin! this mama is very happy with her purchase, i just wish there were more kinds in this package. They are very sturdy as well. my two year old daughter has chewed a bit on some and they are very hard to break or dent. They are also big enough that even for my two year old i consider them relatively safe. Very satisfied with the construction of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Description is a bit misleading
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are somewhat misleading. These dinosaurs are about and inch to inch and a half in size.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan N

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids play with these all the time. We used them to "flesh out" a dinosaur, to make our own clay fossils, and the kids just enjoy playing with them in the dirt and sand.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mosier

customer_reviews.title: Tiny skeletons!
customer_reviews.text: These dinosaur skeletons were great, but they are REALLY SMALL. I ordered them to replace a few lost "regular sized" skeletons that we bought that looked eXaCtLy the same. These would be cute on cupcakes! ((The one on the left was what I was expecting & the little one was what arrived.))
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: Great dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: Love these dinosaurs. I have a 5 year old girl that is really interested in dinosaurs. I bought an 11 lb. bag of kinetic sand and a bin and put the sand and these dinosaurs in it for a birthday present for her. The variety of dinosaurs is great, no two are alike. We are not buying a book so we can look up the names of each one and their characteristics.
customer_reviews.author: Julia L. Izzolo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, fun for kids of all ages.
customer_reviews.text: These are super fun. I bought them to bury in a sand box and do a lesson on Archeology. I gave the children paintbrushes and some scraping tools and they dug up the skeletons and we identified each one. They had a blast, and still talk about that lesson. The figures are good quality. They endured quite a lot of scrapping and pulling and re-burying and they have help up quite nicely, even 2 years later.
customer_reviews.author: M. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool
customer_reviews.text: these are the greatest things ever. i made dinosaur excavation kits for my son's birthday and these were perfect. i'll be ordering him more for christmas since he wants one of each for himself :) PS. for those wondering WHAT type of dinosaurs they are - the name is stamped into the bottom of each creature's belly or bottom of its feet.
customer_reviews.author: The Scrapper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, variety and size
customer_reviews.text: These dinosaurs are great! My boys (aged 2 and 4) love them. We have some to play with inside and others are for the sandbox. I buried a number of them so they could "excavate" them and pretend to be archaeologists. They seem well made and are really nice size. We got a great variety of skeletons in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these dinosaurs to bury in a sandbox for my sons birthday party I just received them today And they're all pretty good quality they're big enough that I I'm not worried about my five-month-old playing with them I would just watch her because the tail it's kind of like they're not and they're all pretty good quality they're big enough that I I'm not worried about my five-month-old playing with them I would just watch her because the tail it's kind of long they're not really pointy or anything i only got two that dont stand up which i dont mind my son already loves them
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your little paleontologist
customer_reviews.text: For a dinosaur themed unit, we made some 'sand' (search for cloud dough) and I packed it over the top of these skeletons. My son had a great time with a shovel and paintbrush, excavating the dinos. They also served as accessories for our baking soda/vinegar volcano. They are large, which we liked, and the only drawback is one of the tails broke off after someone stepped on it. They seemed a little bendy but are apparently more brittle than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, great assortment of dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: My son received these for Xmas and he really loved them. You get a nice variety of different dinosaurs and it is really cool trying to identify them by their bones. My son asked for dinosaur skeleton action figures for Xmas and I was shocked to see that something close to what he wanted actually existed. He was very happy!
customer_reviews.author: QAnon

customer_reviews.title: Even "I" think these are cool
customer_reviews.text: I needed something "dinosaur" , and priced relatively inexpensively as an add-on gift. This was more than just right. Way bigger and more detailed than the photo and price suggests. A cool look "inside" of dinosaurs, with a hint of creepy thrill from the posed skeletons. Educational and fun. By the way, the dinosaurs are all different species - and highly detailed so even grandpa (me) could name most of them.
customer_reviews.author: T.M. Reader

customer_reviews.title: Fun variety
customer_reviews.text: Fun alternative to traditional dinosaur toys. Kids (2&4) love them. They are hard and will put dents in wooden furniture, so heads up there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon7Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just went to a major natural history museum and saw ...
customer_reviews.text: Just went to a major natural history museum and saw these exact figurines in the gift shop for five dollars apiece, so... feeling rather thrifty and clever for having just bought the whole pack and saved myself the hassle of dragging tchotchkes back for the nieces and nephews.
customer_reviews.author: David P Kleinschmidt

customer_reviews.title: Fossils Far Better Than Anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I teach Pre-School, so these Dinosaur Fossils have been thoroughly tested. The whole class loves them, durable, and larger than I had anticipated for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bliss Grey

customer_reviews.title: Well made dinosaur fossil
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy made and good size. We bought this as a part of our dinosaur unit study in our home school. Kids made their own fossils looking at these. We are planning to use this for homemade dino dig also. The names of each dinosaurs are written on the underside of dinosaurs are nice. So far it withstood various rough plays by our kids. It would be nice for party favors too. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: vespers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sandbox dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: These were much better than I had hoped! We like to bury a few dinosaur skeletons in the sandbox and let the kids be paleontologists for the summer and needed some fresh ones this year. These are the best I've bought and came a reasonable price! They were larger than I expected and have lots of different dinosaurs included. They are perfect for this use!
customer_reviews.author: Laura E Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loved these. We immediately took them to the sand box to dig for dinosaur bones. Their color is a lot better than the stock photo. We got 12 different dinosaurs - no doubles! Really great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany U.

customer_reviews.title: Watch for the seller!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these, 2 were exactly as pictured, 5-6" figured in 12 different designs (Tucker's Toy Shop) - and they are JUST what I wanted for my daughter's science party! The 3rd ended up coming from The Wonderworld and contained 12 figures 1-2" in size. COMPLETELY not what I was looking for. I returned the items and I'm not waiting for the replacement from Tucker's Toy Shop - let's hope I get the right thing this time!
customer_reviews.author: GeekMom

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my almost 3-year-old son to "dig up fossils" in a sand table. I got 12 different dinosaurs in my assortment, and they are fairly well constructed. The Pterandon seems a little flimsy, but I'm not sure how they could have made it stronger. My dinosaurs all came in one package, not separately packaged as some reviewers said, so this may be a new way of packaging which ensures there are no duplicates. These are a bit smaller than what I thought they would be, about 1/2 the size of the dinos from the dollar bin at Walmart, but for this purpose they are perfect. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: floydandfernandfayesmom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and big
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to do a fossil dig for my sons 5th birthday party. These were perfect. Very big for the price. Good quality. Sturdy - I made a dirt egg out of sand, coffee grounds, and flour, and one little boy was banging his egg with a rubber mallet. I was afraid he would break the skeleton, but nope, it held up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Sakeena

customer_reviews.title: Received broken. Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Arrived with a few broken. Didn't end up using for the party purchased for. Went to send back and not eligible for return. Nonsense...
customer_reviews.author: Hstanley

customer_reviews.title: Names on the bottom!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a couple of these as a souvenir gift at the Smithsonian in D.C. for $2 a pop. After having time to think about it, I realized that I'd like some for my little boy and luckily I found these on Amazon! I couldn't be happier with this product and the price. I love that the names of the dinos are printed on the underside of each one!
customer_reviews.author: BR Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a school project. Excellent for this purpose. A few of the models are fragile and will break off. However, I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Hannibal

customer_reviews.title: They don't stand up!
customer_reviews.text: Most cannot be made to stand up. T-Rex on his side isn't fun to play with. I bought them for my 6-year old grandson. He opened them found they just fall over, and hasn't touched them since.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and as described
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these packs, and they are great! They are larger than my hand, and are "aged" bone color (light plastic with brown shadows). Most of them stand upright just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jaberwocky

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these fossils.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these fossils. He is 4 years old and we play with them in his sand table. We have small paint brushes and shovels to have our own dinosaur dig. They are sturdy and have the names imprinted on the belly side. My son has memorized and is able to recite all the names of the dinosaurs in this set. He has been able to match some of these dino fossils to the dinosaur figures we won at Incredible John's pizza. These probably wont be good for kids who want to put the bones together but doing a faux dinosaur dig. these are fine. The dinos even stand up as shown.
customer_reviews.author: California RN

customer_reviews.title: Used these to make dinosaur fossil eggs! FUN
customer_reviews.text: These are well made dinosaur fossil bones. Much better than the $1 store or Oriental Trading. I was very impressed with the quality. I bought them for my son's 4th Dinosaur birthday party. I put these inside of coffee dough, baked them in the oven at a very low temperature and they looked like real dino eggs! I hid the eggs in the woods of our yard. Here is the tutorial if you're interested. [...] I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLehi

customer_reviews.title: Package with less dinosaurs than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good, however I ordered two packages that had 8 dinosaurs instead of 12. I had 24 guests and had no time to replace. If they are going to include 8 not 12 dinosaurs, should advertise the truth.
customer_reviews.author: Pats

customer_reviews.title: Fun Time
customer_reviews.text: These little dino bones are great and well made for the price. I bought a couple of bags for my Grandson's dino birthday party. I put them in a sand box, covered the with sand and all the kids plastic dino shovels and let them dig for dinosaur bones. They all had a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties and educational activities
customer_reviews.text: We used these to create a "dinosaur excavation" activity at my son's birthday party. We put these in deep foil tins along with shiny treasure rocks and covered them with sand. They are larger than we expected (true to size) and worked wonderfully for the activity. The preschoolers stayed engaged in the digging activity for 15 minutes or more which is amazing. Definitely recommend buying!
customer_reviews.author: S. Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Perfect party favors
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for a dinosaur party, so I figured these would make for an awesome "dino dig" activity and fun party favors. They really are neat looking, seem to be sturdy and well made with pretty good detail. There is a good variety in the assortment, so the kids can trade with each other for added fun. I am impressed enough that I plan to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Hamman

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my son's birthday and he loved it. The pieces look like they are glazed
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son's birthday and he loved it. The pieces look like they are glazed, which is hard to see in the photos. But the glazing accentuates the bones and really makes them look cool. We buried some in the dirt and others in ice blocks and let the kids pretend to be paleontologists.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment
customer_reviews.text: I got a pack of these for a dino dig party in our backyard. They were exactly what I wanted and the price was great. Now I see them everywhere in stores but Amazon was the only place you could find these when I was looking. This is yet-again why Amazon is my favorite place to shop.
customer_reviews.author: Flashpoint

customer_reviews.title: Cute party toy
customer_reviews.text: They were cute for a dinosaur party. Filled tubs with dirt and let the kids dig up dinosaur bones.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfTwo

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the balsa wood 3-D puzzles we got for ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Just got these in the mail today and am crazy excited to give them to my 4 y.o. twins in the Easter baskets! They look very durable (except the pteradactyl). Way better than the balsa wood 3-D puzzles we got for them which broke even as we were putting them together. They will be THRILLED.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Bednar

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety & Price!
customer_reviews.text: These were AWESOME for a Dinosaur Dig Birthday Party I did recently. These were baked into a sand mixture and the kids were given a set of "tools" to dig them out. They LOVED it! And I loved the variety, the sturdiness and the PRICES!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great dinosaurs!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dinosaur-fanatic 3-year-old. Put these in his sandbox for his birthday party so it was like they were digging up dinosaur bones. He still plays with them months later and loves them. I like how they are anatomically correct and are great quality. I believe what is included are two or three of each kind - stegasaurus, triceratops, t-rex, pteranadon, etc. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Snoz

customer_reviews.title: Fun and useful but a little creepy
customer_reviews.text: Not gonna lie - when these arrived, they were kind of creepy looking! I bought them for a "dino dig", and they have worked well for that purpose (we bury them in the sand at the beach), and if you look at them individually they look cool to see the bones, but they just have a bit of a creepy vibe as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good deal. My kid and I love them. A dozen dinosaurs. Heavy duty plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dinosaur Fossil Skeleton Figures 5 - 6 "
customer_reviews.text: My son loves playing with these and they are a huge hit with him. I put these in the Dinosaur dig pit at his birthday party and all the kids had a great time digging them up and thus being archeologists. He still plays with them and they are excellent quality, sturdy, and accurate to detail. They only thing I wish was that they had the name of the dinosaur printed somewhere on the figure so I could tell him without having to go look up which one was which. A minor inconvenience really.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Ford

customer_reviews.title: I have purcahsed over a dozen of these fossils!
customer_reviews.text: We get invited to tons of birthday parties. This gift is ALWAYS a hit! Both boys and girls from two to six years old love playing with these fossils. I always have two unopened packs in my house for last minute gifts. We live in southern California so they're perfect for the beach and playground. They're not small! Good size fossils which make for fun and easy digging.
customer_reviews.author: California Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Going to be putting them in the sandbox for excavation! They are very sturdy and don't bend much. They also make an awesome looking addition to our lizard terrarium!
customer_reviews.author: aaron gotter

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun & very durable!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, there are duplicates... but since there were more than one of each dinosaur in real life too, does it really matter?!?! I bought these for my 5 year old daughter, along with the National Geographic Dinosaur book (sold here) and she loves the figures & the book. We have buried them in her sand box & "uncovered fossils", we have given them bubble baths, played in the mud, and they were even "captured" by our large breed dogs & still survived!!! They are very cute & close enough to accurate that we were able to find & identify them correctly in the Dino Book. Great Buy for any Dinosaur fan :) I do recommend them! Enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.author: KristinT

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool addition to our Dinosaur Bday Party!
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for my daughter's 2nd birthday party. I would have given the product a 5, but one of the dinosaurs' legs were kind of funky. It was one of the biped dinosaurs so he couldn't stand up.
customer_reviews.author: redhawkprop

customer_reviews.title: Great selection/Detailed quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I used them for a birthday party fossil dig and the size, quality and selection was great! They are also detailed and interesting. I did not get any duplicates, all 12 were different. A couple didn't stand because they got pressed down in shipping. They are fixable by bending the legs back in to place. I kept the Stegosaurus for myself because it's my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jump

customer_reviews.title: Only 8 Dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: The dinosaur skeletons were great. They were of a nice size, and seemed sturdy and well-made. The only problem is that the item claims to have 12 pieces, and even shows a picture of 12 dinosaurs, but I ordered two packages, and both of them had only 8 dinosaurs. This is a problem if you are planning for 20 kids and think you've ordered 24 dinosaurs, but there's really only 16.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: very life like!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for life like fossils that will hold up to preschoolers for years and I am glad to say I found them. THESE ARE A MUST HAVE FOR ANY DINOSAUR UNIT. Heavy duty plastic. Great details. The kids asked if they could get a magnifying glass they were so thrilled by these. The size is perfect to fit in their hand but isn't so small you can't see the details. A+++++++
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for Young learners
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 yr old grandson tells me the names of dinosaurs that I cannot even pronounce! The small set of dinosaur fossils will be the perfect addition to add to his excitement and interest in learning more about the great Dinos who roamed the earth. Soon he'll be ready for a visit to the museum to see the "real" thing!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Good toy for outdoor play
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a 4 year old little boy. They are durable and hold up to rough play. They are a great outdoor toy. We have a bean box and these are a fun toy to hide and then search for. (Instead of sand the box is filled with beans) The package contained a good variety of dinosaurs. For the price you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: SennyD

customer_reviews.title: Great toy. Very realistic
customer_reviews.text: Great toy. Very realistic! Used for fossil dinosaur cake with crushed Oreos for dirt. Son loved it! Still being played with months later in sensory bins and outside in dirt
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Missing dinos.
customer_reviews.text: They're really cool, but I only got 8 in my pack. I was going to put them in party favors for my son's party. Now I'm four short. Not cool!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: These are bigger than I imaged and absolutely awesome. We use them in our sand table
customer_reviews.text: These are bigger than I imaged and absolutely awesome. We use them in our sand table. The kids love them. They've held up well with no broken bones. Har har. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M

customer_reviews.title: Great for decorative pieces for an archaeology themed party
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as part of my sons birthday party, themed archaeology. I put it on a sheet cake along with a giant version. He loved it and the guests were pretty amazed. Also used them as a decorative pieces, scattered on the table and some on the food, like in a dino bone (pretzels) grave yard. Really glad I found these and helped enhanced the party.
customer_reviews.author: Christian K

customer_reviews.title: These are great! Good size
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Good size, good quality, and they were a big hit! Used them for a "dinosaur dig" at my son's bday party and the kids loved it. 2 bags of play sand in a dollar store baby pool with a bag of these, cheap easy fun that the kids really enjoyed
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Half sized as described
customer_reviews.text: The description does not properly reflect product size. The largest dino from tip to tail is 3” not 6-7 inches. The bag they all came in is smaller than the description. Sorely disappointed. #returntosender
customer_reviews.author: Katharine K.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool looking but our son was not that impressed ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool looking but our son was not that impressed with them. He may take one or two into the bath but does not play with them much. They are shipped to the USA and take a long time to get. But if you have a die hard dinosaur kid then he/she may enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: HonestFeedback

product_meta.title: Rhode Island Novelty Assorted Dinosaur Fossil Skeleton 6-7 Inch Figures, 12-Piece
product_meta.description:
Set of Dinosaur Skeletons includes twelve different 3 dimensional figures that stand up to 4-3/4 Inch tall or 6 Inch long. They're made from flexible plastic and can stand up on their own. Great fun indoors or out. You can even have a pre-historic dig and bury these "fossil like" figures and dig them back up, wash them off and play some more - great fun.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Set of Dinosaur Skeletons includes twelve different 3 dimensional figures that stand up to 4-3/4 Inch tall or 6 Inch long. They're made from flexible plastic and can stand up on their own. Great fun indoors or out. You can even have a pre-historic dig and bury these "fossil like" figures and dig them back up, wash them off and play some more - great fun.
feature_bullets: Size: From 4-3/4" tall up to 6 Inch long
Size: From 4-3/4" tall up to 6 Inch long

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars690 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
